title: LATEST NFL COACHING VACANCY NEWS & RUMORS: EVALUATING THE OPENINGS AROUND THE LEAGUE
description:
The latest Josina Anderson Insider show features the latest news on who the Giants plan to hire and what they're likely looking for. What the Chicago Bears plan to do to repair their football operations and what the Houston Texans are looking for in their next football coach.


(0:23) Baker Fallout
(3:53) Broncos interviewing Aaron Glenn
(5:41) Dolphins Interviewing Leslie Frazier
(10:45) Giants Opening
(23:45) Bears Opening
(30:12) Broncos Head Coaching
(34:00) David Culley Fired


Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
